mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.NAME, g.price, g.imagePath, g.preferential, g.introduction, gt.type_name FROM t_goods as g, t_goods_type as gt, t_goods_id_type as gti where g.id = gti.goods_id and gt.id = gti.goods_type_id
SELECT g.*, gt.type_name FROM t_goods as g, t_goods_type as gt, t_goods_id_type as gti where g.id = gti.goods_id and gt.id = gti.goods_type_id and g.id = #{id}
SELECT g.id,g.`name`,g.price,g.preferential,img.path FROM t_goods g,t_goods_images img WHERE g.id = #{id} and g.id = img.goods_id
SELECT g.imagePath, g.id, g.NAME, g.price, g.preferential FROM t_goods AS g WHERE g.id = #{goodsId}

SELECT g.id, g.`name`, g.price, g.preferential, g.grade, g.introduction, g.imagePath FROM t_goods g, t_goods_type gt, t_goods_id_type git WHERE g.id = git.goods_id and gt.id = git.goods_type_id
and g.name Like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select g.id, g.`name`, g.price, g.preferential, g.introduction, g.imagePath from t_goods g where g.id in
#{orderGoods.goodsId}
